column1: vigraha vyAvartanI kArikA
column2: @27a * // rgya gar skad du /bi gra ha bya brta ni k'a ri k'a n'a ma / bod skad du / rtsod pa bzlog pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa zhes bya ba / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

column1: sarvezAm BAvAnAm sarvatra na vidyate svaBAvaH ced
column2: gal te dngos po thams cad kyi // rang bzhin kun la yod min na // khyod kyi tshig kyang rang bzhin med //

column1: tvad vacanam asvaBAvam na nivartayitum svaBAvam alam
column2: rang bzhin bzlog par mi nus so //

column1: aTa savaBAvam etat vAkyam pUrvA hatA pratijQA te
column2: 'on te tshig de rang bzhin bcas // khyod kyi dam bca' snga ma nyams // mi 'dra nyid de de yin na //

column1: vEzamika tvam tasmin viSeza hetuH ca vaktavyaH
column2: khyad par gtan tshigs brjod par gyis //

column1: mA Sabda vat iti etat syAt te budDiH na ca etat upapannam
column2: de sgra ma 'byin lta bu'o zhes // khyod blo sems na de mi 'thad //

column1: Sabdena hi atra satA BavizyataH vAraNam tasya pratizeDa pratizeDaH pi evam iti matam Bavet tat asat eva
column2: 'di la sgra ni yod pa yis // 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzlog yin // 'gog pa'i 'gog pa'ang de lta zhes // 'dod na de yang bzang min te //

column1: evam tava pratijQA lakzaFataH dUzyate na mama
column2: khyod kyi dam bca'i mtshan nyid las // de ltar skyon yod nged la med //

column1: pratyakzeNa hi tAvat yadi upalaBya vinivartayasi BAvAn
column2: re zhig gal te mngon sum gyis // dngos rnams dmigs nas zlog byed pa //

column1: tat na asti pratyakzam BAvAH yena upalaByante
column2: gang gis dngos rnams dmigs 'gyur ba // mngon sum de ni med pa yin //

column1: anumAnam pratyuktam pratyakzeNa Agama upamAne ca anumAna Agama sADyAH ye rTAH dRzwAnta sADyAH ca
column2: rjes dpag lung dang dpar 'jal dang // rjes dpag lung gis bsgrub bya dang // dpes bsgrub bya ba'i don gang yin // mngon sum gyis ni lan btab po //

column1: kuSalAnAm Darma avasTA vidaH ca manyante
column2: skye bo chos kyi gnas skabs mkhas // dge bdag gi chos rnams la //

column2: dge ba'i rang bzhin yin par ni // sems shing lhag ma rnams la yang //

column1: nEryANika svaBAvaH DarmAH nEryANikAH ca ye tezAm
column2: gang dag nges par 'byin pa'i chos //

column1: Darma avasTA uktAnAm evam anEryANikA AdInAm
column2: chos kyi gnas skabs gsungs de rnams // nges par 'byin pa'i rang bzhin nyid // rang bzhin nges 'byin min la sogs //

column1: yadi ca na Bavet svaBAvaH DarmANAm niHsvaBAvaH iti evam
column2: gal te chos rnams rang bzhin med // rang bzhin med ces bya ba yin // ming yang de bzhin med 'gyur zhing //

column1: nAma api Bavet na evam nAma hi nirvastukam na asti
column2: gzhi med ming ni med phyir ro //

column1: aTa vidyate svaBAvaH sa ca DarmANAm na vidyate tasmAt
column2: 'on te rang bzhin yod mod kyi // de ni chos rnams la med na // de phyir chos rnams spangs pa yi //

column1: DarmEH vinA svaBAvaH sa yasya tat yuktam upadezwum
column2: rang bzhin gang de bstan par rigs // gang phyir khyim na bum pa med //

column1: sataH eva pratizeDaH na asti GawaH gehaH iti ayam yasmAt
column2: ces bya'i 'gog pa yod nyid la // mthong ba de phyir khyod kyi yang //

column1: dRzwaH pratizeDaH yam sataH svaBAvasya te tasmAt
column2: 'gog 'di yod la rang bzhin yin //

column1: aTa na asti sa svaBAvaH kim nu pratiziDyate tvayA anena
column2: ci ste rang bzhin de med na // khyod kyi tshig 'dis ci zhig @27b dgag / tshig med par yang med pa yi //

column1: vacanena Rte vacanAt pratizeDaH siDyate hi asataH
column2: 'gog pa rab tu grub pa yin //

column1: bAlAnAm iva miTyA mRgatRznAyAm yaTA jala grAhaH
column2: byis pa rnams kyis smig rgyu la // ji ltar chu zhes log 'dzin ltar //

column1: evam miTyAgrAhaH syAt te pratizeDyataH hi asataH
column2: de bzhin khyod kyis yod min la // log par 'dzin pa 'gog byed na //

column1: aTa na eva asti grAhaH na eva grAhyam na ca grahItAraH
column2: ci ste 'dzin pa yod min zhing // gzung med 'dzin pa po med na //

column1: pratizeDaH pratizeDyam pratizedDAraH nanu sa santi
column2: 'o na 'gog dang dgag bya dang // 'gog pa po yang yod ma yin //

column1: pratizeDaH pratizeDyam pratizedDAraH ca yadi uta na santi
column2: gal te 'gog dang dgag bya dang / 'gog pa po yang yod min na //

column1: sidDAH hi sarva BAvAH tezam eva svaBAvaH ca
column2: dngos po kun dang de rnams kyi // rang bzhin nyid kyang grub pa yin //

column1: hetoH ca te na sidDiH nEHsvABAvyAt kutas hi te hetuH
column2: khyed la gtan tshigs mi 'grub ste // rang bzhin med phyir khyod kyi rtags // gal te yod de khyod don de //

column1: nirhetukasya sidDiH na ca upapanna asya te rTasya
column2: gtan tshigs med phyir 'grub mi 'thad // khyod la gtan tshigs med par yang //

column1: yadi ca ahetoH sidDiH svaBAva vinivartanasya te Bavati
column2: rang bzhin bzlog pa grub yin na // nga la'ang gtan tshigs med par ni //

column1: svABAvyasya astitvam mama api nirhetukam sidDam
column2: rang bzhin yod pa nyid du 'grub // ci ste gtan tshigs yod na dngos //

column2: rang bzhin med ces bya mi 'thad //

column1: lokezu niHsvaBAvaH na hi kaH cana vidyate BAvaH
column2: srid na rang bzhin med pa yi // dngos 'ga' yod pa ma yin no // gang la rang bzhin yod min pa'i // 'gog pa gal te snga 'gyur zhing //

column1: pUrvam ced pratizeDaH paScAt pratizeDyam iti anupapannam
column2: dgag bya phyi zhes 'thad min la //

column2: phyis dang cig car yang mi 'thad //

column1: hetu pratyaya sAmagryAm ca pRTak ca api mad vacaH na yadi
column2: gal te nga'i tshig rgyu rkyen dang // tshogs dang so so la yang med //

column2: 'o na dngos rnams stong grub ste ; / rang bzhin med pa nyid phyir ro // rten rnams 'byung ba'i dngos rnams gang //

column1: yaH ca prati ityaBAvaH BAvAnAm SUnyatA iti sA proktA
column2: de ni stong nyid ces brjod de //

column2: gang zhig rten nas 'byung ba de // rang bzhin med pa nyid yin no //

column1: nirmitakaH nirmitakam mAyA puruzaH sva mAyayA sRzwam
column2: sprul pa yis ni sprul pa dang // sgyu ma yis ni skyes bu yi // sgyu mas phyung la 'gog byed ltar //

column1: pratizeDayeta yadvat pratizeDaH yam taTA eva syAt
column2: 'gog pa 'di yang de bzhin 'gyur //

column1: na svABAvikam etat vAkyam tasmAt na vAda hAniH me
column2: nga yi tshig de rang bzhin med // de phyir nga yi phyogs mnyam la //

column2: mi 'dra nyid kyang med pas na // gtan tshigs khyad par brjod mi bya // sgra ma 'byin bya bzhin zhe na //

column2: khyod kyis gang brtsams dpe 'di min //

column2: rang bzhin med pa nyid log na // rang bzhin nyid du rab 'grub 'gyur // yang na kha cig sprul pa yi //

column2: bud med la ni bud med snyam // log 'dzin 'byung la sprul pa yis //

column1: yadi kA cana pratijQA syAt me tatas eza me Bavet dozaH
column2: gal te ngas dam bcas 'ga' yod // des na nga la skyon de yod //

column1: pratyakza AdiBiH arTEH tad aBAvAt me nupAlamBaH
column2: med phyir de la klan ka med //

column1: na AdeH sidDiH tatra asti na eva maDyasya na antasya
column2: bar ma yin zhing tha ma'ang min //

column1: tezAm aTa pramANEH vinA prasidDiH vihIyate vAdaH
column2: 'on te tshad ma med par yang // de rnams grub na smra ba nyams // mi 'dra nyid de de yin na //

column1: vEzamika tvam tasmin viSeza hetuH ca vaktavyaH
column2: gtan tshigs khyad par smra bar gyis // ji ltar me yis gzhan bdag nyid // gsal byed de bzhin rang bdag ltar // de bzhin tshad ma rnams kyang ni // rang bzhin bdag nyid sgrub ce na // smras ba de ni mi mthun te // mun khung nang gi bum pa bzhin // de la mi dmigs ma mthong bas //

column1: vizama upanyAsaH yam na hi AtmAnam prakASayati agniH na hi tasya anupalabDiH dRzwA tamasi iva kumBasya
column2: me ni rang nyid gsal byed min //

column1: yadi ca sva AtmAnam ayam tvad vacanena prakASayati agniH

column1: pracCAdayizyati tamaH sva para AtmAnO hutASaH iva

column2: 'bar byed dang ni gang gzhan na // me 'dug pan mun pa med //

column2: gsal byed de ni mun sel na // ji ltar gsal bar byed pa yin //

column1: utpadyamAnaH eva prakASayati agniH iti asat vAdaH
column2: me 'byung nyid na gsal byed pa // yang dag min par smra ba ste //

column1: utpadyamAnaH eva prApnoti tamaH na hi hutASaH
column2: me 'byung nyid na mun pa dang // phrad pa med pa kho na yin //

column1: aprAptaH pi jvalanaH yadi vA punar anDakAram upahanyAt
column2: yang na me dang ma phrad kyang // mun pa sel bar byed na ni // 'di na yod pa gang yin pas //

column1: anapekzya hi prameyAn arTAn yadi te pramANa sidDiH iti

column1: na Bavanti kasya cit evam imAni tAni pramANAni

column2: gal te tshad ma rnams la ni // ma ltos par yang gzhal bya 'grub // gang phyir de dag de 'grub na //

column1: kim te pramANa sidDyA tAni yad arTam prasidDam tat
column2: khyod kyi tshad ma 'grub pas ci //

column1: aTa tu pramANa sidDiH Bavati apekzya eva te prameyANi
column2: ci ste khyod kyi tshad ma rnams // gzhal bya rnams la ltos nas 'grub //

column1: vyatyayaH evam sati te Druvam pramANa prameyANAm
column2: de ltar khyod kyi tshad ma dang // gzhal bya nges par ldog par 'gyur /

column2: 'on te khyod kyis tshad grub pas // gzhal bar bya ba 'grub 'gyur la //

column2: ci ste pha de bskyed bya na // des na gang gis gang bskyed smros //

column1: DarmANAm para BAvaH svaBAvaH evam kaTam Bavati
column2: rang gi ngo bo ji ltar 'gyur // 'on te dge ba'i chos rnams kyis // rang gi ngo bo de 'ga' la'ang //

column2: ma brten skye na de lta na'ang //

column1: DarmANam evam syAt vAsaH na brahmacaryasya na aDarmaH DarmaH vA saMvyavahArAH ca lOkikAH na syuH

column1: mRgatRzNA dRzwAnta vyAvRtti viDO yaH uktaH prAk
column2: smig rgyu'i dpes bzlog bsgrub pa'i tshe // sngar smras gang yin de dang ni // snga mas gtan tshigs med pa yi // lan btab gyur te mtshungs phyir ro //

column1: yaH trEkAlye hetuH pratyuktaH pUrvam eva sa sama tvAt
column2: dus gsum gtan tshigs gang yin sngar // lan btab nyid dam mtshungs phyir ro //

column1: trEkAlya pratihetuH ca SUnyatA vAdinAm prAptaH
column2: dus gsum tshod kyi gtan tshigs ni // stong nyid smra ba rnams la rung //

column1: praBavati ca SUnyatA iyam yasya praBavanti tasya sarva arTAH
column2: gang la stong pa nyid srid pa // de la don rnams thams cad srid //

column1: praBavati na tasya kim cit na praBavati SUnyatA yasya yaH SUnyatAm pratItyasamutpAdam maDyamAm pratipadam ca
column2: gang la stong nyid mi srid pa // de la ci yang mi srid do // gang zhig stong dang rten 'byung dag / dbu ma'i lam du don gcig par //

column1: eka arTAm nijagAda praNamAmi tam apratima budDam
column2: gsung mchog mtshungs pa med pa yi // sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo // rtsod pa bzlog pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa zhes bya ba / slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so / // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzny'a na garbha dang / bod kyi lo tstsha ba ka ba dpal brtsegs kyis la sgyur ba la /
